amendment.description: To cap non-defense, non-trust-fund, discretionary spending at the previous fiscal year's level, beginning with fiscal year 2007.

action.text: Amendment SA 2355 proposed by Senator Inhofe.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 2355.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 2355 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 32 - 67. Record Vote Number: 286.
Amendment SA 2355 ruled out of order by the chair.
